description: Associates the specified tags to a resource with the specified resourceArn. If existing tags on a resource are not specified in the request parameters, they are not changed. When a resource is deleted, the tags associated with that resource are deleted as well.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the MediaConnect resource to which to add tags.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A map from tag keys to values. Tag keys can have a maximum character length of 128 characters, and tag values can have a maximum length of 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---
